learning_outcomes: Understand and use B2 Social Issues vocabulary
Apply B2 Third Conditional structures in context

content.prompt_es: Escribe la respuesta correcta para completar la oración:
content.stimulus_en: If I ______ (know) the truth, I wouldn't have lied.

content.prompt_es: Escribe la respuesta correcta para completar la oración:
content.stimulus_en: If we ______ (leave) earlier, we wouldn't have missed the bus.
